articles.title: Giant Prehistoric Fish From Ancient Supercontinent Found Under Road - Newsweek
articles.description: The fish, whose fossil was unearthed in South Africa, lived around 419 million years ago.
articles.content:
A giant prehistoric fish from an ancient supercontinent has been discovered underneath a rural road in South Africa.
